variables.frame1: Hello! This is a demonstration</br> of the LancetJS library
variables.frame2: We show you many features of this library.</br>LancetJS can help you to create a desktop-based system</br> with the implementation of the window interface.
variables.frame3: All pages can be opened by using Launchers.</br> It is a component like shortcuts on your desktop.</br>Let`s begin! But first we will close window.
variables.frame4: And now we open information section.
variables.frame5: We can display any picture on screen! Watch...
variables.frame6:
It provides a lot of opportunities for creating
various widgets and apps.
